title: Chargrilled steak with chopped salad and blue-cheese dressing
directions: Step 1 Oil the steaks then mix the paprika, garlic salt and pepper, and rub into both sides.
Step 2 To make the dressing, put the cheese in a bowl and mash in the soured cream. Whisk in the vinegar, mustard and 1 tbsp water, then season.
Step 3 Heat a griddle pan over a high heat until very hot and sear the steaks for 2 minutes each side, then rest for 5 minutes under loose foil.
Step 4 Toss the salad vegetables together then plate up with the steak. Drizzle over the dressing then sprinkle over chives to finish.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper ¼ tsp
halved Little Gem 1, cut into chunks
creamy blue cheese (such as gorgonzola dolce or dolcelatte) 50g
